# BooleanLiteralType

**Associated Type**

A type that represents a Boolean literal, such as `Bool`.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype BooleanLiteralType : _ExpressibleByBuiltinBooleanLiteral
```
title: BooleanLiteralType
